translation.en: Um, excuse me.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: I'm looking for Eric Hayes. Could you let him know that Kate from Channel 12 News is here, please?
translation.ja: エリック･ヘイズさんに 通してもらっても？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: いいけど―

translation.en: Hayes is in, but he's not talking to reporters.
translation.ja: 彼はリポーターには 話さないよ

translation.en: -Oh-- -Hey, George, it's all good.
translation.ja: ジョージ 任せろ

translation.en: -I was at the construction worker rescue. -Again?
translation.ja: レスキュー現場にいたの また？

translation.en: -We've gotta stop meeting like this. -[laughs]
translation.ja: 妙な縁だな

translation.en: I'm really glad you're okay.
translation.ja: 無事でよかった

translation.en: Yeah. Looks more impressive than it is. You know, we're pretty well-trained.
translation.ja: 大したことじゃない 訓練してるからね

translation.en: Yeah, but it must be hard putting your life on the line every day.
translation.ja: でも命懸けの大変な仕事だわ

translation.en: I like knowing I'm making things better, you know.
translation.ja: 社会の役に立てる

translation.en: See, that's exactly why you should do an interview.
translation.ja: それをインタビューで話して

translation.en: Look, I cover the bummer beat every single day.
translation.ja: 私は 危険な事件ばかり 報道してるけど…

translation.en: Sorry, the what?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: You know, um, disaster, murder, violence, the things that go wrong.
translation.ja: 災害や殺人や暴力 悲惨なニュースばかりよ

translation.en: But today, I watched you take something that had gone horribly wrong...
translation.ja: だけど今日のあなたは 悲惨な現場から…

translation.en: and you made it right.
translation.ja: 人を救った

translation.en: And when that happens... viewers need to see that.
translation.ja: それを視聴者に届けたいの

translation.en: I feel like you can talk anyone into an interview.
translation.ja: 説得がうまいな

translation.en: Just not today. You're not gonna convince me.
translation.ja: だけど俺は説得されない

translation.en: Well, can I ask why?
translation.ja: 理由を教えて

translation.en: You ask a lot of questions.
translation.ja: 質問が多いな

translation.en: Well, I am a reporter. It's kind of what we do.
translation.ja: 記者はそういうものよ

translation.en: We can't all be heroes like you, you know.
translation.ja: ヒーローとは違うわ

translation.en: I'm not a hero. I'm just doing my job. You know, I'm at work right now, just like you.
translation.ja: ヒーローじゃない 君と同じで仕事してるだけだ

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: So, really, no interview?
translation.ja: どうしてもダメ？

translation.en: My editor's gonna kill me.
translation.ja: 編集長に殺される

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: But maybe we should do this again sometime, you know, without the emergency vehicles.
translation.ja: 救急車のないところで 改めて話すのは？

translation.en: -Um, yeah. Yeah, I'd like that. -[cell phone vibrates and chimes]
translation.ja: そうね　ぜひ

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
translation.ja: 失礼

translation.en: Yeah? Central Park? I got Sunday off.
translation.ja: 日曜に セントラル･パークでどう？

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, Sunday-- Sunday works great. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.ja: ええ 日曜で問題ないわ

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I have to go. This is my editor. Apparently Good Sam is giving away money again.
translation.ja: もう行かないと サムが活動を再開したって

translation.en: -Really? Where? -Uh...
translation.ja: マジで？　場所は？

translation.en: Sunnyside and Lenox Hill.
translation.ja: サニーサイドと レノックス･ヒル

translation.en: You really can't be Good Sam, can you? -I've had eyes on you all day. -[phone chimes]
translation.ja: あなたじゃないわね ずっと見張ってたもの

translation.en: Okay, I gotta go.
translation.ja: 行かないと

translation.en: I'll see you on Sunday.
translation.ja: 日曜にね

translation.en: -[Eric] I'll text you. -Great.
translation.ja: メールする ええ

translation.en: Hey, Lauren said that you--
translation.ja: ローレンから…

translation.en: -What's going on? -[sighs]
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: We got scooped.
translation.ja: 先を越された

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 何ですって？

translation.en: That woman in Sunnyside who found a hundred grand...
translation.ja: サニーサイドの女性は…

translation.en: Channel 3 just reported it an hour ago.
translation.ja: チャンネル３が報道した

translation.en: -You're kidding. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: The family in Lenox Hill...
translation.ja: もう１件は

translation.en: Channel 9 just reported that on their six o'clock cast.
translation.ja: チャンネル９に取られた

translation.en: -But you sent me to that building rescue. -No, no.
translation.ja: でも 私は救出現場に… それは違う

translation.en: The news sent you. And you knocked it out of the park.
translation.ja: ニュースが君を呼んだ 上出来だったよ

translation.en: Kate...
translation.ja: ケイト

translation.en: you were meant for the bummer beat. That's your thing.
translation.ja: 君は危険な事件の報道が 合ってる

translation.en: Fires, car crashes, Black Friday riots at the mall.
translation.ja: 火災や事故 ブラック･フライデーのデモ

translation.en: This Good Sam story, not so much.
translation.ja: サムじゃ物足りない

translation.en: Is this supposed to be some kind of pep talk, 'cause I'm not--
translation.ja: 励ましてくれてるなら…

translation.en: Management wants a bigger name on this.
translation.ja: 上層部は知名度を求めてる

translation.en: They want Susan.
translation.ja: スーザンだ

translation.en: On my story?
translation.ja: 私のネタなのに？

translation.en: Come on, Kate. You know how this works.
translation.ja: 君なら分かるだろ

translation.en: Every other station has their most senior reporter on it,
translation.ja: 他局は ベテラン記者をつけてる

translation.en: and Susan does have 15 years' experience--
translation.ja: スーザンはベテランで…

translation.en: And an Emmy Award. I know. I get it.
translation.ja: エミー賞も獲ってる 分かるわ

translation.en: But I'm the one that broke this story, remember?
translation.ja: でも最初に報道したのは私よ

translation.en: Please just give me some more time. I will find Good Sam.
translation.ja: お願い　サムを見つけるわ

translation.en: It's a done deal. Susan's out covering the latest drop-offs.
translation.ja: 決定事項だ スーザンにも通達された

translation.en: Send her your notes.
translation.ja: 引継ぎをしろ

translation.en: I've got you at 10:00 a.m. in Queens, covering the garbage strike deadline.
translation.ja: 10時にクイーンズで ストライキの中継を

translation.en: Garbage strike.
translation.ja: ストライキね

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: It'll be an easy day. You could use it.
translation.ja: 今日は楽するといい

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Kate...
translation.ja: ケイト

translation.en: There's a bigger story out there for you.
translation.ja: ネタは他にもある

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.ja: クソ

translation.en: Good Sam struck again today.
translation.ja: サムが再び現れました サムが再び現れました 〝サムがクイーンズの 家族に10万ドル〞

translation.en: New York City's mysterious philanthropist left $100,000 cash
translation.ja: 〝サムがクイーンズの 家族に10万ドル〞 〝サムがクイーンズの 家族に10万ドル〞 今回10万ドルを 受け取ったのは

translation.en: on a lucky family's doorstep in Queens.
translation.ja: クイーンズに住む 家族です

translation.en: This is the seventh gift from New York City's Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムからの提供は これで７回目です

translation.en: [Josh] Do we have to listen to Susan's report on our story?
translation.ja: 僕たちの ネタじゃなかったっけ？

translation.en: -It's killing me. -I know.
translation.ja: 僕たちの ネタじゃなかったっけ？ 知ってる

translation.en: From Hunters Point, Queens, I'm Susan Andrews...
translation.ja: ハンターズ･ポイントより…

translation.en: Wait, Hunters Point?
translation.ja: ハンターズ･ポイント？

translation.en: -What's up? -Well...
translation.ja: どうした

translation.en: the first four Good Sam gifts were left all over the city, but...
translation.ja: 最初に起きた４件は お互い場所が遠いけど

translation.en: Look.
translation.ja: 見て

translation.en: These last three were close together.
translation.ja: 最後の３件は近い

translation.en: David took you off Good Sam.
translation.ja: もう担当じゃない

translation.en: I'm allowed to be curious.
translation.ja: 別にいいでしょ

translation.en: Consider this my new hobby.
translation.ja: 新たな趣味よ

translation.en: What is it?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: Just a text message from someone claiming to be Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムと名乗る人物からの メールよ

translation.en: What's it say?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: Seriously? I'm sure it's just another fake.
translation.ja: どうせ これも偽者よ

translation.en: "Dear Kate, I want to set the record straight about who I am
translation.ja: “ケイトへ” “僕の正体と―” “金を提供する 理由を教えたい”

translation.en: and why I've been giving away substantial sums of money."
translation.ja: “金を提供する 理由を教えたい”

translation.en: Scooch.
translation.ja: つめて

translation.en: "I'm willing to reveal myself to you, and only you, a reporter I know I can trust."
translation.ja: “信頼できる記者だから 君だけに教えるつもりだ”

translation.en: I mean, we've heard this before.
translation.ja: 前にもあったわ

translation.en: Lots of guys out there claiming to be Good Sam.
translation.ja: みんな自分を サムと主張してる

translation.en: "If you'd like proof that I'm Good Sam,
translation.ja: “証拠が必要なら―”

translation.en: go see John Baylor at 225 Watson in Astoria.
translation.ja: “ワトソン通り 225番地 ジョン･ベイラー宅へ”

translation.en: I left $100,000 on his front porch an hour ago."
translation.ja: “１時間前に 10万ドルを置いてきた”

translation.en: Okay, but seriously, I'm sure reporters all over the city got this text.
translation.ja: ＮＹ中の記者が 全員 受け取ってるはずよ

translation.en: Yeah, sounds pretty spammy to me too,
translation.ja: 確かにスパムっぽいな

translation.en: but Watson Street in Astoria is right near Hunters Point.
translation.ja: だけどワトソン通りは ハンターズ･ポイントの側だ

translation.en: -Is it? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: ホント？ ああ

translation.en: You know what? You're right. It is.
translation.ja: 確かにそうね

translation.en: So then, what are we waiting for?
translation.ja: なら 行くしかないわね

translation.en: Let's go see what's on John Baylor's front porch.
translation.ja: ジョン･ベイラーの玄関前へ

translation.en: -Which one did you say it is? -I think it's across there.
translation.ja: どれ？ あそこだ

translation.en: [Josh] So you're really sure about this, huh?
translation.ja: 本気で行くの？

translation.en: -I just have a hunch. -A hunch that we're gonna get murdered?
translation.ja: 予感がするの 殺人の予感？

translation.en: It's broad daylight. What's the worst that could happen?
translation.ja: 真昼間から何も起こらないわ

translation.en: -Famous last words. -[laughs]
translation.ja: どうかな

translation.en: Hi. John Baylor?
translation.ja: ジョン･ベイラーさん？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: I'm from Channel 12 News.
translation.ja: チャンネル12です

translation.en: Yeah, I know who you are.
translation.ja: 知ってるよ

translation.en: You're the second surprise to show up on my front porch today.
translation.ja: 今日２回目のサプライズだ

translation.en: By that, do you mean you also found a bag with a stack of cash in it?
translation.ja: 現金入りの袋を 見つけたんですね？

translation.en: Yeah, it was--
translation.ja: ああ…

translation.en: Wait, how did you know? I just got home 20 minutes ago.
translation.ja: なぜ それを知ってるんだ？

translation.en: We, um...
translation.ja: 私たち…

translation.en: We're just that good. [laughs]
translation.ja: 優秀なの

translation.en: Would you be willing to do an interview for the news?
translation.ja: インタビューしても？

translation.en: Yeah, but you'll want to talk to Sylvia.
translation.ja: シルビアと話してくれ

translation.en: Sylvia!
translation.ja: シルビア

translation.en: She's the reason why Good Sam chose us.
translation.ja: 彼女のおかげだ

translation.en: Hi, how are you?
translation.ja: 元気？

translation.en: I'm good. And you?
translation.ja: 元気よ

translation.en: -Good, thanks. -Would you guys like to come in?
translation.ja: よかった どうぞ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, thank you.
translation.ja: 失礼します

translation.en: [John] Right this way.
translation.ja: こっちへ

translation.en: [John] My wife is really sick.
translation.ja: 妻が病気で

translation.en: There's a treatment, but, um, our insurance doesn't cover it.
translation.ja: 保険では治療費が カバーできません

translation.en: So, my daughter, she said, "Daddy, can we make a video for Good Sam?"
translation.ja: それで 娘が “サムにお願いしよう”と

translation.en: And Sylvia, why did you decide you wanted to send a message to Good Sam?
translation.ja: なぜサムにメッセージを 送ろうと思ったの？

translation.en: [Sylvia] I wanted him to help my mommy.
translation.ja: ママを助けてほしくて

translation.en: [John] Then I made a video on my phone, and we posted it on the Channel 12 site.
translation.ja: チャンネル12のサイトに 投稿しました

translation.en: Yeah, and I was on the news just like you.
translation.ja: ニュースに出たの

translation.en: [Kate] That's right. You were.
translation.ja: そうだったわね

translation.en: If Good Sam were watching right now, what would you like to say to him?
translation.ja: サムに何と伝えたいですか？

translation.en: Good Sam...
translation.ja: サム

translation.en: you're giving us back some hope... some plans for our future, when...
translation.ja: あなたは 私たち家族に 未来への希望をくれました

translation.en: we really thought we were out of both.
translation.ja: 諦めていたのに

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Thank you, Good Sam.
translation.ja: ありがとう サム

translation.en: We had to make sure the lead was legit before we brought it to you.
translation.ja: 情報の裏取りをしたまでよ

translation.en: You're gonna run it, right? I mean, that kid. Like, come on.
translation.ja: もちろん放送するだろ？

translation.en: It's good, all right? It's good.
translation.ja: 確かに よくやった

translation.en: But this is Susan's story, and this is not gonna go over well with station management.
translation.ja: だがスーザンの担当に 変わりはない

translation.en: David, we are the only station that has this story, for now.
translation.ja: このネタをつかんでるのは まだ うちだけよ

translation.en: All right, fine. I'll run it.
translation.ja: 分かった　放送しよう

translation.en: But in case I wasn't clear before,
translation.ja: だが もう一度言おう

translation.en: you get any more leads, you bring them to her.
translation.ja: 情報はスーザンへ渡せ

translation.en: -Okay, but what if Good Sam doesn't-- -[David] Kate, Kate...
translation.ja: でも サムが… ケイト

translation.en: Kate, please, just-- just do what I ask you. For once?
translation.ja: 一度でいいから 言うとおりにしてくれ

translation.en: What are you looking at?
translation.ja: 何だよ

translation.en: He's fun.
translation.ja: 面白い

translation.en: -It was good. -It was good. It was very good.
translation.ja: 当たりね 確かに

translation.en: My dad and I actually raced a boat here once. We took seventh place.
translation.ja: 父とボートレースに出て 入賞したことがあるわ

translation.en: No kidding. I probably saw you there.
translation.ja: それは偶然だな

translation.en: When my brother and I weren't out sailing with my dad, we were here racing boats.
translation.ja: 俺も よく兄と一緒に ここでレースしてた

translation.en: We built our own models every winter to race the next summer.
translation.ja: 毎年 冬になると作るんだ

translation.en: -Wait, you built them? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 自分で作ったの？ ああ

translation.en: Fancy. Do you still sail?
translation.ja: 今でもセーリングを？

translation.en: Ah, no, not anymore.
translation.ja: もう やらない

translation.en: Um, so, tell me about kid Eric. Was he as obsessed with fire trucks as he was boats?
translation.ja: ヨットと同じくらい 消防車にも夢中だったの？

translation.en: Well, yeah. Every kid dreams of being a firefighter. I'm just one of the lucky grown-ups who got to be.
translation.ja: 消防士は子供の憧れだ 俺はラッキーだっただけさ

translation.en: I'm not sure everyone would describe a job where you have to risk your life daily to save strangers as "lucky."
translation.ja: 死と隣り合わせの仕事に 就けたのがラッキーなの？

translation.en: All right. Maybe not lucky, then.
translation.ja: ラッキーは違うかな

translation.en: Useful... works. I like knowing that I'm useful.
translation.ja: 人の役に立つのが好きなんだ

translation.en: That and the ability to cook at work.
translation.ja: それと料理も―

translation.en: Kid Eric also loved his toy kitchen.
translation.ja: 子供の頃から好きだった

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Yeah. Nice.
translation.ja: 本当に？　ステキ

translation.en: I mean, if you're free sometime this week, I'd love to cook you dinner.
translation.ja: 今週 空いてる日があれば 夕食を作るよ

translation.en: A home-cooked meal? I will not say no to that.
translation.ja: 手料理を断る理由はないわね

translation.en: -[cell phone chimes] -Ooh, sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: Everything okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. Um, it's just another text from Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムから またメールが来たわ

translation.en: Another text?
translation.ja: “また”？

translation.en: Yeah, he texted me yesterday with an address for the money that he left for a family in Astoria.
translation.ja: 昨日も彼がお金を置いた家の 住所を送ってきたの

translation.en: You didn't go, did you?
translation.ja: 行ったの？

translation.en: Josh and I went. And the lead panned out. The money was there and everything.
translation.ja: ジョシュとね 確かにそのとおりだった

translation.en: What does this one say?
translation.ja: 今度は何て？

translation.en: Uh, "Now that you know I'm Good Sam,
translation.ja: “今夜９時に センター＆ホワイトの―”

translation.en: meet me at nine tonight on level 5A of the parking lot at Center and White.
translation.ja: “今夜９時に センター＆ホワイトの―” “５Ａ駐車場で会おう”

translation.en: Come alone and don't bring cameras."
translation.ja: “カメラなしで１人で来て”

translation.en: Why would he want a reporter to come alone without cameras?
translation.ja: リポーターが１人で カメラなし？

translation.en: Oh, I have met sources in some pretty sketchy places, trust me.
translation.ja: 怪しい場所での 待ち合わせには慣れてる

translation.en: Yeah, but still, somebody who gives away this kind of money would either want to keep it completely quiet
translation.ja: これだけの金を譲るような 人物は正体を隠すか

translation.en: or meet you someplace safe for a proper interview.
translation.ja: まともな形で 取材を受けるはずだ

translation.en: I-I don't know, I don't trust this guy. I wouldn't go if I were you.
translation.ja: この男は 信用しないほうがいい

translation.en: But he's my story. I have to know who he is.
translation.ja: 私のネタだもの 確かめないと

translation.en: And plus, he's changing things. I mean, he's making people want to help others.
translation.ja: それに彼は 人々にいい影響を与えてるわ

translation.en: All right. If you insist on meeting this Good Sam...
translation.ja: どうしても このサムに会うと言うなら―

translation.en: at least let me come with you.
translation.ja: 俺もついてく

translation.en: Thanks, but I'll be fine.
translation.ja: ありがとう　でも平気よ

translation.en: Come on, let me do this.
translation.ja: やらせてくれ

translation.en: He won't know, but I'll be there, making sure you're safe.
translation.ja: 彼にはバレないように 見守ってるよ

translation.en: Okay. Thanks.
translation.ja: 分かった　ありがとう

translation.en: -[Eric] You all right? -[sighs]
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: [Eric] I'm here. I haven't taken my eyes off you for the past ten minutes.
translation.ja: 心配するな さっきから目を離してない

translation.en: Um, I'm really glad you're here, wherever that is.
translation.ja: どこにいるか知らないけど 心強いわ

translation.en: Look, don't worry, Kate. I won't let anything happen to you.
translation.ja: 心配するな　俺がついてる

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Uh... he's late.
translation.ja: 遅いわね

translation.en: I'm worried he's not gonna show at all.
translation.ja: 来ないのかも

translation.en: -Oh, hey, I think that's him. I gotta go. -Okay.
translation.ja: 来たみたい　切るわ 了解

translation.en: Jack?
translation.ja: ジャック？

translation.en: Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムだ

translation.en: -Sorry I'm late. -Wait, you're Good Sam?
translation.ja: 遅れてごめん あなたがサム？

translation.en: Why didn't you just come out and tell me?
translation.ja: なぜ黙ってたの？

translation.en: I can-- I can explain everything, just not here.
translation.ja: 説明するから― 別の場所へ移動しても？

translation.en: -Can we go talk somewhere else? -Sure.
translation.ja: 別の場所へ移動しても？ いいわ

translation.en: -Hey! Is everything okay? -What the hell do you think you're doing?
translation.ja: 何か問題でも？ やめろよ

translation.en: [Kate] Oh, it's okay. Jack, this is Eric Hayes.
translation.ja: いいの ジャック エリックよ

translation.en: Kate, I asked you to come alone.
translation.ja: 話が違うぞ

translation.en: Are you Good Sam?
translation.ja: サムか？

translation.en: All you need to know is that she's completely safe with me.
translation.ja: 彼女に危険なことはしない

translation.en: It's okay. Jack's a friend of my dad's. I know him.
translation.ja: 平気よ　ジャックは 父の知り合いなの

translation.en: All right, we gotta go. We're blocking this guy, so...
translation.ja: 行こう　道を開けないと

translation.en: I'll call you.
translation.ja: 電話する

translation.en: Eight's always been my lucky number,
translation.ja: ８は僕の ラッキーナンバーだ

translation.en: and on the eighth of this month, I made $800,000 on an investment. Even I wasn't expecting it.
translation.ja: 今月８日に 投資で たまたま80万ドル儲けたんだ

translation.en: So I figured if it just fell into my lap, why not someone else's?
translation.ja: それで どうせなら 誰かにあげようと思いついた

translation.en: And how did you choose the people you wanted to help?
translation.ja: その相手は どう選んだの？

translation.en: Like Christina Gomez.
translation.ja: クリスティーナとか

translation.en: I just kept my ears open.
translation.ja: アンテナを張ってた

translation.en: My assistant goes to church with Christina,
translation.ja: 部下が彼女と同じ教会だった

translation.en: and then I saw Sylvia Baylor's video on your report.
translation.ja: 部下が彼女と同じ教会だった シルビアは 君のリポートで見た

translation.en: But why all the secrecy? I mean, why not just give them the money and tell them who it's from?
translation.ja: でも どうして名前を 伏せる必要があったの？

translation.en: I didn't want the attention.
translation.ja: 注目されたくなかった

translation.en: You know, that's why I hired someone to drop off the money.
translation.ja: だから 人を雇って 金を置いたんだ

translation.en: And what about the text messages to me?
translation.ja: 私にメールを送ったのは？

translation.en: When I saw that they gave Susan Andrews your Good Sam story,
translation.ja: 君のネタが スーザンに行ったと聞いて

translation.en: I thought if I got in touch with you directly, then you could get your story back.
translation.ja: 直接 連絡すれば 君が取り戻せると思った

translation.en: But now everyone's talking about Good Sam,
translation.ja: だけど話が大きくなりすぎて

translation.en: and I keep expecting a reporter to...
translation.ja: だけど話が大きくなりすぎて 今にもリポーターに 突撃されるんじゃないかと

translation.en: burst into my office with a camera crew.
translation.ja: 今にもリポーターに 突撃されるんじゃないかと

translation.en: I'm in way over my head here, Kate.
translation.ja: 手に負えなくなってきた

translation.en: I'm-- I'm kind of hoping that you can help me figure out... what to do next.
translation.ja: どうするべきか 一緒に考えてくれないか

translation.en: I think what you should do next is try to get ahead of the story.
translation.ja: 私は その話を 公開するべきだと思うわ

translation.en: You should let me interview you.
translation.ja: インタビューさせて

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: No, I really don't want to be a story.
translation.ja: 話題になりたくない

translation.en: Look, if you go public and tell people why you did this,
translation.ja: 名乗り出て なぜ やったかを話せば

translation.en: the story can go back to being about helping people,
translation.ja: 世間の関心は 人助けに向くわ

translation.en: instead of this mystery around who is Good Sam.
translation.ja: 謎の人物サムを 追うことじゃなくね

translation.en: You really think that'll help?
translation.ja: そう思う？

translation.en: I do. And I think it'll inspire people.
translation.ja: 思うわ それに人々の心を動かす

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Okay. -I trust you. -[laughs]
translation.ja: 分かった　信じるよ

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: I'll need proof, of course.
translation.ja: 証拠が必要よ

translation.en: Copies of the statements of the windfall you're talking about, withdrawals--
translation.ja: 臨時収入のあった 口座の記録と…

translation.en: Yeah, I'll, uh, email you everything tonight.
translation.ja: ああ 今夜メールで送るよ

translation.en: Great.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: I know who Good Sam is.
translation.ja: 突き止めたわ

translation.en: -Go on. -His name is Jack Hansen. He runs a hedge fund called Northern Lights Investments.
translation.ja: 名前はジャック･ハンセン ヘッジファンドの経営者よ

translation.en: He made about $800,000 last month on a stock deal no one else thought to make.
translation.ja: 先月 株の取引で予想外の 80万ドルが手に入ったので

translation.en: Says he decided to give it away.
translation.ja: 人に譲ることに

translation.en: Got any solid evidence?
translation.ja: 証拠はあるのか？

translation.en: He's the one that gave me the tip about the money being at John Baylor's house.
translation.ja: ベイラー家の情報を くれたのは彼よ

translation.en: -Okay, but does that prove it's him? -No, but this might.
translation.ja: 証拠になる？ いいえ　でもこれが

translation.en: His financial records.
translation.ja: 彼の口座履歴よ

translation.en: Look here.
translation.ja: 見て

translation.en: The day before this all started, before Christina Gomez found the money,
translation.ja: クリスティーナが お金を見つけた日の前日

translation.en: Jack Hansen withdrew $400,000 from his account, all at once.
translation.ja: 彼は一度に40万ドルを 口座から引き出してる

translation.en: Then here, again, the day before the fifth bag appears,
translation.ja: それから５つ目の袋が 見つかる前日にも

translation.en: Hansen withdraws another $400,000.
translation.ja: さらに40万ドルを 引き出してるわ

translation.en: I mean, that's gotta be more than just a coincidence.
translation.ja: 偶然とは思えない

translation.en: That's what you said about the dead Realtor.
translation.ja: 前にも聞いたな

translation.en: Okay, but this time I'm sure I'm right.
translation.ja: 今度は間違いないわ

translation.en: David, he wants to give me an exclusive interview.
translation.ja: 独占インタビューができるわ

translation.en: Any evidence you didn't get from Hansen himself that you can corroborate with another source?
translation.ja: 本人からの情報以外で 事実と合致するのは？

translation.en: Other than the Baylor tip, no, but if we wait, he could take the story elsewhere.
translation.ja: ベイカーの件のみだけど 待ってる時間はないわ

translation.en: Say yes and I will sit down with Hansen right away.
translation.ja: インタビューの許可を

translation.en: I can't do it.
translation.ja: ムリだ

translation.en: Station management will come down on me hard if I go with you and not Susan for something this big.
translation.ja: スーザンじゃなく君に やらせたら上に怒られる

translation.en: You know what? This story is not just about Jack Hansen.
translation.ja: ジャック･ハンセンの 話だけじゃないわ

translation.en: This story is about how Channel 12 was the first station to find Good Sam,
translation.ja: 最初にサムを発見した チャンネル12の話でもある

translation.en: a man that everyone has been looking for.
translation.ja: 誰もが探してる男よ

translation.en: And I am the only one that can tell that story.
translation.ja: 私だけが それを伝えられるのよ

translation.en: Jack, what inspired you to do this?
translation.ja: きっかけは何でしたか？

translation.en: I wanted to help the workers.
translation.ja: 労働者たちのためです

translation.en: Regular people who work two jobs to put a roof over their families' heads,
translation.ja: 家族のために仕事を 掛け持ちする人や

translation.en: who pay taxes while living paycheck to paycheck.
translation.ja: 苦しい生活の中で 税金を払う人

translation.en: They're working longer and harder these days and...
translation.ja: 彼らの労働環境は 過酷になる一方で―

translation.en: they should not be forgotten.
translation.ja: 見過ごせない

translation.en: So why come forward now?
translation.ja: なぜ今になって公表を？

translation.en: Um, many people were claiming to be me.
translation.ja: サムを名乗る人物が 大勢 出てきたので

translation.en: I just wanted to set the record straight about what I wanted to accomplish.
translation.ja: 私の真の目的を 明らかにしたかったんです

translation.en: And what is that?
translation.ja: それは？

translation.en: I wanted to lend a hand in the best way that I could...
translation.ja: 〝ジャック･ハンセン氏 サムを名乗り出る〞 私にできる最善の方法で 手を差し伸べたかった

translation.en: to...
translation.ja: 〝ジャック･ハンセン氏 サムを名乗り出る〞 日々を懸命に闘っている 戦士たちのために

translation.en: the soldiers in our everyday lives.
translation.ja: 日々を懸命に闘っている 戦士たちのために

translation.en: The people who keep our factories open, who teach our kids in school.
translation.ja: 工場を動かす人たちや 学校の先生たち

translation.en: Without those people... our city could not function.
translation.ja: それらの人々なくして 我々の生活は機能しない

translation.en: And they deserve our support.
translation.ja: 彼らを助けたい

translation.en: Thank you, Jack.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I've been speaking with Jack Hansen,
translation.ja: ジャック･ハンセン氏に 話を伺いました

translation.en: Manhattan hedge fund manager who says he's Good Sam,
translation.ja: ジャック･ハンセン氏に 話を伺いました 彼はサムとして

translation.en: the man behind the anonymous cash gifts being left on New York City doorsteps.
translation.ja: ＮＹの玄関先に 匿名で現金を配りました

translation.en: Over to you, Chuck.
translation.ja: 以上です

translation.en: [woman] And we're out.
translation.ja: オーケー

translation.en: So did you get, uh, everything you wanted?
translation.ja: あれで よかった？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You couldn't have been better.
translation.ja: 上出来だったわ

translation.en: So I just got off the phone with the network,
translation.ja: たった今 連絡があって

translation.en: and they want a special report for their national broadcast.
translation.ja: 全国放送での オンエアが決まった

translation.en: The story's going national tonight?
translation.ja: 全国放送？

translation.en: Yep. Uh, you better lay low
translation.ja: そうだ 目立つなよ

translation.en: because, come six o'clock tonight, you're gonna be a very famous man.
translation.ja: ６時が来れば 君は有名人だからな

translation.en: Ah, I'll make sure to enjoy my remaining anonymity.
translation.ja: じゃあ それまでの時間を 楽しまないと

translation.en: This is a great thing you're doing here, Jack.
translation.ja: 感謝してるよ

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Wow. Uh, okay. I'm not ready for this day to be over.
translation.ja: まだ 僕の１日は 終わってないぞ

translation.en: What do you think about grabbing something to eat?
translation.ja: 食事でもしよう

translation.en: Sure. But you should keep a low profile tonight, like David said.
translation.ja: いいわよ だけど 目立たないようにしないと

translation.en: Do you know anywhere kind of out of the spotlight?
translation.ja: いい場所ある？

translation.en: I know just the place.
translation.ja: 任せろ

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Our interview aired 15 minutes ago and we're already over 10,000 hits.
translation.ja: 15分前にオンエアされて アクセスが１万超えたわ

translation.en: Are you surprised?
translation.ja: 意外？

translation.en: -You're a great interviewer. -Thanks.
translation.ja: 君のインタビューだ

translation.en: Okay, ready for the best Mexican food in Manhattan?
translation.ja: マンハッタンで一番の メキシカンだぞ

translation.en: Yes, I am.
translation.ja: 楽しみ

translation.en: Oh, shoot. Channel 9's here. We should go.
translation.ja: まずい チェンネル９よ

translation.en: -We should go out the back. -Jack Hansen! Good Sam!
translation.ja: 裏へ ジャック･ハンセンさん

translation.en: Who are you gonna give the money to next?
translation.ja: 次は誰に？

translation.en: Um... I'm gonna make this brief. I want to help the workers.
translation.ja: ちょっと説明するよ 労働者のためです

translation.en: Uh, regular people who work two jobs to put a roof over their families' heads,
translation.ja: 家族のために仕事を 掛け持ちする人や

translation.en: who pay taxes while living paycheck to paycheck.
translation.ja: 苦しい生活の中で 税金を払う人

translation.en: They're working longer and harder these days, and...
translation.ja: 彼らの労働環境は 過酷になる一方で―

translation.en: they should not be forgotten.
translation.ja: 見過ごせない

translation.en: -Are you going to be giving again? -No more questions.
translation.ja: 今後の予定は？ 質問は終わりだ

translation.en: That was, uh... unexpected.
translation.ja: 今のは予想外だったな

translation.en: Yeah, no kidding. How did they know where to find us?
translation.ja: まったくよ なぜ 分かったの？

translation.en: Someone must have followed us from the station.
translation.ja: 局からつけてきたんだろう

translation.en: Looks like we're not gonna able to stop people from talking about Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムの話は まだ続きそうだな

translation.en: I guess not.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: You know, I noticed that what you told the reporters
translation.ja: さっき話してた内容だけど

translation.en: was almost word for word what you said in our interview.
translation.ja: インタビューの時と ほぼ一緒だったわ

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: Guess I rehearsed too much last night.
translation.ja: リハーサルしすぎたかな

translation.en: Probably over-prepared for our interview.
translation.ja: 何度も繰り返し練習したから

translation.en: I'm glad I did, though. -You were phenomenal. -[laughs]
translation.ja: でも 君は すばらしかったよ

translation.en: I think, uh... I think you're gonna be able to leverage this story for... whatever you want.
translation.ja: このネタを好きなところで 使えばいい

translation.en: Anchor, network, write your ticket.
translation.ja: キャスターでもキー局でも

translation.en: That's not what I want out of this story.
translation.ja: それは望んでない

translation.en: Okay. Well, uh...
translation.ja: そうか じゃあ…

translation.en: what, um... what do you want then? Why were you looking for me, for Good Sam?
translation.ja: サムを探し出して 何がしたかったんだ？

translation.en: Because he's...
translation.ja: だって彼は…

translation.en: You are exactly what I didn't think existed.
translation.ja: 私が存在しないと 思ってた人だからよ

translation.en: Someone doing good, expecting nothing in return.
translation.ja: 見返りを求めずに よい行いをするなんて
それなら…

translation.en: glad you found me then.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: That's not what I meant. I...
translation.ja: そうじゃないの

translation.en: Sorry, I...
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: I thought that, um...
translation.ja: お互いに…

translation.en: -there was a spark between us. -No, no, there was, but...
translation.ja: 好意があると 違うの あるけど…

translation.en: you're my story now.
translation.ja: あなたは取材対象だから

translation.en: Look, it's been a long day.
translation.ja: 長い１日だったわ 送ってくれる？

translation.en: -Would you mind just taking me home? -Yeah. Of course.
translation.ja: 長い１日だったわ 送ってくれる？ ああ もちろん

translation.en: Let's, uh... Let's hop on the bridge.
translation.ja: 橋を渡ってくれ

translation.en: I, um... I've been texting you but hadn't heard back yet.
translation.ja: メールを送ったのに 返事がないから

translation.en: Sorry, it's been a... -Been a rough shift. -Oh.
translation.ja: ごめん　忙しかったんだ

translation.en: And I was a little thrown the other night when your Good Sam showed up.
translation.ja: それに例のサムのことで 面食らってね

translation.en: Yeah. No, I was as surprised as you.
translation.ja: そうね　私も驚いたわ

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: そう？

translation.en: Thought he was your father's friend.
translation.ja: 父親の友達なんだろ

translation.en: And I, uh, saw him leading you out of a restaurant last night on Channel 9.
translation.ja: 彼と一緒にレストランから 出てくるのを見た

translation.en: Well, he's the subject of my story.
translation.ja: 彼は取材対象だもの

translation.en: I'd say you've got your hands full.
translation.ja: 忙しいみたいだな

translation.en: Well, are we still on for dinner tomorrow night?
translation.ja: 明日の夕食の約束は？

translation.en: I'll text you.
translation.ja: メールする

translation.en: Come on, guys. Get a move on!
translation.ja: みんな 出動だ

translation.en: [man] Hustle, hustle, hustle!
translation.ja: 急げ 急げ

translation.en: [Eric] Let's go. Come on!
translation.ja: よし 行くぞ

translation.en: [woman] Moving out!
translation.ja: 出発

translation.en: Oh, my God, look. You have to see this.
translation.ja: 見てよ これ

translation.en: National News Dispatch, New York Daily View,
translation.ja: あちこちに載ってるわ

translation.en: and don't even get me started on your emails.
translation.ja: メールの数も半端ないわ

translation.en: Your interview has over a million views online.
translation.ja: 再生数は100万回以上よ

translation.en: -I'm sorry, did you say a million? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 100万回って言った？ そうよ

translation.en: -Well done, Kate. Good job. -All right, people. Listen up.
translation.ja: やったわね みんな 聞け

translation.en: Last night's interview with Good Sam
translation.ja: 昨夜のインタビューが

translation.en: got us the highest ratings in the station's history.
translation.ja: うちの局史上 最高視聴率を獲得した

translation.en: Thanks to Kate, who got the interview
translation.ja: ケイトのおかげだ あらゆるメディアが 欲しがるインタビューを―

translation.en: that every station and every network, I might add, was trying to get.
translation.ja: あらゆるメディアが 欲しがるインタビューを― 実現した

translation.en: And the story keeps growing.
translation.ja: まだあるぞ

translation.en: Lauren, tell her about the call we got from Washington Heights.
translation.ja: ローレン 例の話を教えてやれ

translation.en: A woman called to say she started an Anonymous Good Samaritan Club.
translation.ja: ある女性が サムの理念を継承する 団体を立ち上げたって

translation.en: They'll be following Good Sam's philosophy.
translation.ja: サムの理念を継承する 団体を立ち上げたって

translation.en: They've already bought a wheelchair for a veteran in their neighborhood.
translation.ja: 退役軍人用の車椅子を 買ったそうよ

translation.en: And some guy in line at the grocery store in Staten Island
translation.ja: スタテンアイランドの スーパーで

translation.en: anonymously paid for the next ten people.
translation.ja: 10人分支払った男性も

translation.en: -Wow. -Kate, see if you can get Hansen -to talk on camera to people he helped. -Sure.
translation.ja: ケイト 受取人たちの 後日談を取れ

translation.en: Lauren, give me man-in-the-street-type interviews.
translation.ja: ローレンは 街頭インタビューを エド

translation.en: Ed, see if you can get some reaction from workers on Good Sam's philosophy.
translation.ja: サムの理念に対する 労働者の意見を集めろ

translation.en: This is our time, people.
translation.ja: 俺たちの時が来たぞ

translation.en: Let's take this story higher, huh?
translation.ja: 勢いに乗っていこう

translation.en: Guys, look! It's Good Sam.
translation.ja: みんな サムが来たわよ

translation.en: [Christina] Good Sam!
translation.ja: サム

translation.en: Don't worry. You're gonna be great.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ

translation.en: [Jack] Christina.
translation.ja: クリスティーナ

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: Oh, Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムなのね

translation.en: I can't thank you enough for what you did for my family.
translation.ja: 感謝しても しきれません

translation.en: But how did you know we needed help?
translation.ja: どうやって私たちを？

translation.en: [Jack] I had a system for finding out who was in need.
translation.ja: あるシステムを使ったんだ

translation.en: Uh, Jack, you said that you knew about Christina's situation because your assistant attends her church.
translation.ja: 部下がクリスティーナと 同じ教会だったんでしょ？

translation.en: Oh, who is it? I want to thank her.
translation.ja: 誰かしら？ お礼が言いたいわ

translation.en: Carla...
translation.ja: カーラだ

translation.en: Muñoz. Um...
translation.ja: カーラ･ムニョス…

translation.en: Long dark hair, brown eyes.
translation.ja: 長い髪で茶色い目の…

translation.en: She said that your faith, uh, inspired her.
translation.ja: あなたの信仰心に 感銘を受けたそうだ

translation.en: Uh, Kate, are we just about wrapped up here? I'm late for a meeting.
translation.ja: ケイト もういいか？ 会議に遅れそうだ

translation.en: I just have a couple more questions.
translation.ja: 他にも質問が

translation.en: It's gonna have to wait, unfortunately.
translation.ja: 悪いけど今日はムリだ

translation.en: Sorry, Christina.
translation.ja: 失礼

translation.en: -We're done? -Uh, yeah. Thanks, Christina.
translation.ja: 終わり？ どうもありがとう

translation.en: Hey, is everything okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, yeah. Uh...
translation.ja: ああ 大丈夫だ 今夜ウィンター議員の パーティーで会えるかな？

translation.en: I'm headed to Senator Wintour's party tonight. I'll see you there?
translation.ja: 今夜ウィンター議員の パーティーで会えるかな？

translation.en: Oh, um, I wasn't planning on it. My dad's in DC.
translation.ja: 行く予定はなかったけど

translation.en: Still, he's a family friend, right? And I'm going there.
translation.ja: 家族の知り合いだろ 僕もいる

translation.en: It'll be fun.
translation.ja: 楽しいぞ

translation.en: Okay, I'll think about it.
translation.ja: 考えとくわ

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Don't know how he'll get through meetings when all anyone's talking about is Good Sam.
translation.ja: サム以外の話題で 会議なんてできるのかな

translation.en: Something was off with Jack today.
translation.ja: 何か様子が変だったわ

translation.en: Well, it's a lot to take in. One day, he's managing a hedge fund, the next, he's on the national news.
translation.ja: 突然こんなに忙しくなったら ムリもないだろ

translation.en: Still, though...
translation.ja: それでも…

translation.en: He seemed incredibly uncomfortable around Christina.
translation.ja: クリスティーナへの 態度が妙だったわ

translation.en: Maybe he felt awkward.
translation.ja: 気まずいのかも

translation.en: He just gave the woman $100,000. What's there to feel awkward about?
translation.ja: 10万ドルあげた人に対して 何が？

translation.en: Yeah, well, when I give someone $100,000, I'll let you know.
translation.ja: いずれ僕が実験するよ

translation.en: Fair enough.
translation.ja: よろしく

translation.en: [Jack] I wanted to lend a hand in the best way that I could...
translation.ja: 私にできる最善の方法で 手を差し伸べたかった

translation.en: to the people who keep our factories open...
translation.ja: 工場を動かす人たちや

translation.en: who fix our cars and our plumbing...
translation.ja: 車や配管を 修理してくれる人たち

translation.en: How many times are you gonna watch the Good Sam interview you did with Jack Hansen?
translation.ja: 何回インタビュー映像を 見たら気が済むんだ？

translation.en: As many times as it takes for me to figure this thing out.
translation.ja: 謎を突き止めるまでよ

translation.en: He's up to something. I just don't know what it is yet.
translation.ja: 彼は何かを企んでる それが知りたいの

translation.en: Here, watch this.
translation.ja: これを見て

translation.en: -I wanted to... -As Good Sam... -...help the workers. -...I want to help the workers.
translation.ja: 労働者たちのためです

translation.en: [both] Regular people who work two jobs to put a roof over their families' heads.
translation.ja: 家族のために仕事を 掛け持ちする人や

translation.en: Who pay taxes while living paycheck to paycheck...
translation.ja: 苦しい生活の中で 税金を払う人

translation.en: Look, the soundbites are near perfect.
translation.ja: 見事に一致してるわ

translation.en: It's almost too polished.
translation.ja: 洗練されすぎてる

translation.en: Yeah, you're right. Solid delivery, too.
translation.ja: 確かに　隙のない演説だ

translation.en: [Kate] Yet, some of the people you helped weren't needy or poor.
translation.ja: ですが 受取人のうち 何名かは…

translation.en: -Can you do me a favor? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 頼みがある

translation.en: Will you please tell David that I am chasing a lead at an event tonight?
translation.ja: 手掛かりを追ってると デヴィッドに伝えて

translation.en: Tonight? Why are you leaving now?
translation.ja: 今から行くの？

translation.en: Ah, because it's black tie, which means I probably should've started getting ready two hours ago.
translation.ja: フォーマルだから 行く前に準備しないと

translation.en: -Right. -Thanks.
translation.ja: そうか ありがと

translation.en: [Kate] I know. I know.
translation.ja: ええ 分かってる

translation.en: David, I'm sorry I bailed on work, but I can't tell you where I am right now.
translation.ja: すっぽかして悪いけど どこにいるかは言えないの

translation.en: At least, not just yet.
translation.ja: でも これは言える

translation.en: But I promise you, no other reporter is with Good Sam tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜サムと一緒の レポーターはいない

translation.en: Okay. I'll call you later.
translation.ja: また連絡するわ

translation.en: Hi. My name is Kate Bradley. I'm Ashok Bradley's daughter.
translation.ja: アショクの娘の ケイト･ブラッドリーです

translation.en: -Sorry, I don't see you on the list. -Um...
translation.ja: リストに見当たらないわ ウィンター議員に 伝えてもらえませんか？

translation.en: Could you just tell Senator Wintour I'm here, please?
translation.ja: ウィンター議員に 伝えてもらえませんか？

translation.en: This is a private party.
translation.ja: プライベートなんです

translation.en: -Kate! -Hi!
translation.ja: ケイト

translation.en: What a surprise! I didn't know you were coming.
translation.ja: 驚いたな 来るとは知らなかった

translation.en: -It's okay. -May I take your things?
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ お荷物を

translation.en: Please. Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Come in.
translation.ja: 中へ

translation.en: It was a last-minute decision. I hope you don't mind.
translation.ja: 直前に決めたの まずかった？

translation.en: -No. -It's so nice to see you, Tom.
translation.ja: 会えてうれしいわ トム

translation.en: So, listen, you know Ashok's not here, right?
translation.ja: アショクはいないよ

translation.en: No, I know. He's still in DC.
translation.ja: ええ 知ってるわ

translation.en: Um, I'm actually not here to see him. I'm-- I'm looking for Jack Hansen.
translation.ja: 父じゃなくてジャック･ ハンセンに会いにきたの

translation.en: Okay, so...
translation.ja: ということは…

translation.en: you know about the big announcement, then?
translation.ja: 一大発表のことは？

translation.en: Uh... big announcement?
translation.ja: 一大発表って？

translation.en: I'll let him tell you.
translation.ja: お楽しみだ

translation.en: -Look, he's around here somewhere, so... -I'll find him.
translation.ja: 彼なら… 探すわ

translation.en: -Nice to see you. -Nice to see you.
translation.ja: またね

translation.en: Thank you so, so much.
translation.ja: 本当にありがとう

translation.en: Wow, this is the best surprise of the evening. You look astonishing.
translation.ja: これは うれしい驚きだな すごくステキだ

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: I'm, uh, happy you made it after all.
translation.ja: 来れて よかった

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.ja: 私も

translation.en: Hey, so, what's this big announcement that Tom told me about?
translation.ja: 一大発表って何のこと？

translation.en: Oh. I'm, uh...
translation.ja: 実は…

translation.en: I'm running for Congress.
translation.ja: 選挙に出る

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: -When did you decide this? -Uh...
translation.ja: いつ決めたの？

translation.en: A group of businessmen approached me and...
translation.ja: 何名かの実業家から 要請を受けて…

translation.en: convinced me to run.
translation.ja: 説得された

translation.en: So, wait. Um...
translation.ja: つまり…

translation.en: In our interview, when you were talking about the workers,
translation.ja: インタビューで言ってた― 生活に苦しんでる 労働者たちの話は…

translation.en: the ones who live paycheck to paycheck, that was...
translation.ja: 生活に苦しんでる 労働者たちの話は…

translation.en: What? That was your campaign statement?
translation.ja: 選挙演説だったわけ？

translation.en: Kate, no. I-I believe everything that I said.
translation.ja: ケイト あの時 話したことは 真実だよ

translation.en: It's why I gave away that money. It's why I'm running for Congress.
translation.ja: 現金を配ったのも 選挙の出馬も それが理由だ

translation.en: So...
translation.ja: じゃあ…

translation.en: how do you explain the gift to Marie?
translation.ja: マリーはどうして？

translation.en: Uh... Marie?
translation.ja: マリー？

translation.en: Yeah, she's the oncologist who works at Parkland Hospital.
translation.ja: パークランド病院の ガン専門医よ

translation.en: Lives in a three-million-dollar house in Fort Greene.
translation.ja: 300万ドルの家に住んでる

translation.en: Not exactly one of the workers that you claim to want to help.
translation.ja: あなたが助けたい 労働者ではないわ

translation.en: Yeah, but, um...
translation.ja: ああ だけど…

translation.en: she-- she also... uh, is on a number of charitable boards,
translation.ja: 彼女は複数の慈善団体の メンバーでもあるし

translation.en: and I... I just had this feeling, like,
translation.ja: 彼女は複数の慈善団体の メンバーでもあるし 何かに役立ててくれると 思ったんだ

translation.en: she would do something good with it, and she did.
translation.ja: 何かに役立ててくれると 思ったんだ

translation.en: Look, Kate, I know that you're not a big fan of the political world,
translation.ja: 君が政治の世界に 否定的なのは分かるけど

translation.en: but your dad's given me his full support.
translation.ja: お父さんも 支援してくれてる

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.ja: そう？ ああ

translation.en: Willing or not, you sure have figured out a way
translation.ja: あなたの野望に ブラッドリー家は 巻き込まれたってわけね

translation.en: to get the Bradleys involved in your big plan.
translation.ja: ブラッドリー家は 巻き込まれたってわけね

translation.en: Look, um...
translation.ja: いいか

translation.en: I'm gonna make a formal announcement on Friday, and I'd love to give you an exclusive interview.
translation.ja: 金曜日に正式発表をしたら 独占インタビューも受ける

translation.en: But, until then, can we keep this between me and you?
translation.ja: だが それまでは ２人の秘密にしてくれ

translation.en: Sure. Why not?
translation.ja: もちろん いいわ

translation.en: [Wintour] Well, there you two are.
translation.ja: そこにいたか

translation.en: Kate, I've put you and Jack at our table.
translation.ja: 一緒のテーブルだ

translation.en: Candace wants to catch up on everything you're doing.
translation.ja: 妻も楽しみにしてる

translation.en: You heard the big news?
translation.ja: 聞いたか？

translation.en: Indeed I did,
translation.ja: ええ 聞いたわ

translation.en: and been promised an exclusive interview.
translation.ja: 独占インタビューの許可も

translation.en: Jack, the 12th District's a real coveted seat.
translation.ja: 12区は激戦だぞ

translation.en: And I think his idea of protecting the workers of this city is gonna be a real breath of fresh air.
translation.ja: 労働者を守る政策は 新鮮な旋風を巻き起こすよ

translation.en: Jack, my boy, come with me. There's somebody I want you to meet.
translation.ja: 来い　紹介したい人がいる

translation.en: David, I've got something.
translation.ja: デヴィッド 話がある

translation.en: Jack Hansen is running for Congress in the 12th District.
translation.ja: ハンセンが 12区の選挙に出馬する

translation.en: -No kidding? -I'd vote for him, for sure.
translation.ja: 本当か？ 投票するわ

translation.en: [David] How do you know this?
translation.ja: どこで聞いた？

translation.en: I, uh... I crashed a party at Senator Wintour's house last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜ウィンター議員の パーティーで

translation.en: He could give the incumbent a run, now that Hansen's a name people know.
translation.ja: 現職は焦るな ハンセンは今や有名人だ

translation.en: Yeah, thanks to us. He's running on a public image that we created for him.
translation.ja: 彼は 私たちが作った イメージを利用する気よ

translation.en: It was never actual news. Just a performance by yet another ambitious politician.
translation.ja: 最初から野心的な政治家の パフォーマンスだったのよ

translation.en: Well, at least Jack Hansen's trying to help people. We could do worse.
translation.ja: 人助けしようとしただけ マシじゃない？

translation.en: [scoffs] Don't you get it?
translation.ja: 分からないの？

translation.en: He used us.
translation.ja: 利用されたのよ

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrates] -Keep digging.
translation.ja: 続けろ

translation.en: Sorry, guys.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: Hey, Dad. Thanks for calling me back.
translation.ja: パパ 折り返しありがとう

translation.en: [Ashok] My assistant said it was urgent.
translation.ja: 緊急な用って？

translation.en: It is. Jack just told me he's running for Congress.
translation.ja: ジャックが 議会へ立候補するって

translation.en: I thought you said it was urgent. I left a Senate Finance Committee meeting.
translation.ja: 財政委員会の会議を 抜けてきたんだぞ

translation.en: [Kate] Dad, please. I need to know when Jack decided to run.
translation.ja: いつ立候補を決めたか 知りたいの

translation.en: When hasn't he talked about running for office? Was it the 12th District?
translation.ja: 常に興味を持ってたよ 12区だったな？

translation.en: I remember a while back, he asked if he had a shot.
translation.ja: 可能性はあるかと聞かれた

translation.en: And what? You said yes?
translation.ja: それでイエスと？

translation.en: Are you backing him?
translation.ja: 支持するの？

translation.en: Well, actually, at the time, I said no.
translation.ja: その時はノーだと言った

translation.en: The people who'd had that position were always household names,
translation.ja: 過去の当選者たちは 著名人ばかりだが―

translation.en: and Jack really didn't have that.
translation.ja: ジャックは違う

translation.en: Not yet, anyway.
translation.ja: 今はまだね

translation.en: Not until he created Good Sam to get everyone's attention.
translation.ja: サムとして 注目を浴びるまでは

translation.en: Well, you can't really fault him for taking advantage of notoriety.
translation.ja: 知名度を利用するのは 悪いことじゃない

translation.en: And, as a Congressional candidate,
translation.ja: それに候補者として

translation.en: maybe he can take this generosity movement and... make some real change with it.
translation.ja: 彼がこの親切の輪を広げて 変化を起こせるかも

translation.en: Dad, it's manipulative. Can't you see that?
translation.ja: パパ 彼は世間を 操ってるのよ

translation.en: All right. Listen, I-I gotta go. I'll, um... I'll call you later.
translation.ja: もう行かないと　かけ直すわ

translation.en: ♪ You're yellow-coated ♪
translation.ja: “もう一度 会いたい”

translation.en: -[Eric] You all done? -[Kate] Yes.
translation.ja: 食べ終わった？

translation.en: Hey, sit. I got it.
translation.ja: 君は座ってて

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: You weren't lying, by the way. You are a really good cook.
translation.ja: 確かに料理上手だったわ

translation.en: Well, you know, you pick up a thing or two cooking for the guys at the fire station.
translation.ja: 消防署の同僚に 振舞ってるうちに覚えたんだ

translation.en: Listen, I think I made some assumptions about you and Jack.
translation.ja: 君とジャックとのこと―

translation.en: And, um, I hope I misread some things.
translation.ja: 俺の誤解だといいんだけど

translation.en: Jack is just my interview subject.
translation.ja: ジャックは ただの取材相手よ

translation.en: And it turns out you were right not to trust him.
translation.ja: それに 確かに 信用できないわ

translation.en: He's running for Congress.
translation.ja: 選挙に出るの

translation.en: He launched a political career after coming forward as Good Sam.
translation.ja: サムを名乗り出たあとで 政界に進出か

translation.en: [Kate] Exactly.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: Just further proof that no one does anything good without expecting something in return.
translation.ja: 見返りなしに善い行いを する人はいないってこと

translation.en: I like to think that's not true.
translation.ja: 俺はそうは思いたくない

translation.en: -Coffee? -Ooh, yeah. Thanks.
translation.ja: コーヒーを？ もらうわ

translation.en: So did you fix this place up yourself?
translation.ja: この家 自分で改築したの？

translation.en: Because, man, it's amazing.
translation.ja: すごいわ

translation.en: [Eric] Yeah. It's a work in progress.
translation.ja: まだ途中だけどね

translation.en: Is this you captaining this beautiful sailboat?
translation.ja: ボートの前で撮ったの？

translation.en: Yeah. That's when me and my brother took the crew up to a friend's place in Maine.
translation.ja: 兄貴と一緒にメーン州の 友達を訪ねた時の写真だ

translation.en: Camden Harbor.
translation.ja: カムデン港だよ

translation.en: -Is this Patrick? -Yeah.
translation.ja: これがパトリック？ ああ

translation.en: He was always the first one on the boat and the last one off. Everyone called him Fish.
translation.ja: いつもボートに乗ってて あだ名は“魚”だった

translation.en: Hmm, Fish.
translation.ja: “魚”ね　あなたは？

translation.en: -Did you have a nickname? -Hawkins.
translation.ja: “魚”ね　あなたは？ ホーキンズ

translation.en: Like the kid from Treasure Island.
translation.ja: 「宝島」の主人公だよ

translation.en: Hawkins. I like that.
translation.ja: いいわね

translation.en: And who's that?
translation.ja: これは誰？

translation.en: Um, just a friend of my brother's.
translation.ja: 兄の友達だよ

translation.en: So is this what dinner's always like with a reporter? All the questions.
translation.ja: レポーターとの夕食は 質問攻めか？

translation.en: Pretty much. When was the last time you went sailing?
translation.ja: まあね 最後のセーリングは？

translation.en: Come on. That wasn't a hard one, was it?
translation.ja: そんなに難しい質問？

translation.en: Not since Patrick died.
translation.ja: 兄が死んだ時だ

translation.en: It just hasn't felt right without him.
translation.ja: 乗る気がしなくて

translation.en: I'm sorry. I-I didn't realize.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: Do you mind if I ask what happened?
translation.ja: 何があったか聞いてもいい？

translation.en: Ah, you don't wanna hear about that.
translation.ja: 聞きたくないと思う

translation.en: I'm listening, if you want to tell me.
translation.ja: 話してくれるなら聞くわ

translation.en: My brother and I went sailing in May for my birthday.
translation.ja: ５月の俺の誕生日に セーリングへ行った

translation.en: And he was so excited... about this new route that he'd planned out and...
translation.ja: 兄貴は新しいルートを 開拓したと うれしそうで…

translation.en: and the surprise he had for me when we got there.
translation.ja: 俺にサプライズがあるとも 言ってた

translation.en: And the weather was perfect.
translation.ja: 最高の天気で―

translation.en: Sun in the sky, a few clouds.
translation.ja: 空には太陽と雲が出てた

translation.en: And then the wind just picked up,
translation.ja: そしたら風が強くなって

translation.en: and all of a sudden...
translation.ja: 突然…

translation.en: this wall of water just came toward us.
translation.ja: 巨大な水の壁が 押し寄せてきた

translation.en: And the boom swung loose and...
translation.ja: ブームが外れて―

translation.en: hit Patrick in the head, knocked us both overboard.
translation.ja: パトリックの頭に命中し ２人とも倒れた

translation.en: I had to fight through the swell to get to him.
translation.ja: なんとか兄貴のもとに たどり着くと

translation.en: And he was unconscious,
translation.ja: 意識がなくて

translation.en: and bleeding a lot.
translation.ja: 血まみれだった

translation.en: I tried CPR, but...
translation.ja: 蘇生措置をしたけど…

translation.en: I lost him.
translation.ja: 兄は死んだ

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: つらかったわね

translation.en: You see, I'm not the hero everyone thinks I am.
translation.ja: 俺はヒーローなんかじゃない

translation.en: I couldn't even save my own brother.
translation.ja: 兄を救えなかった

translation.en: Hey, you did everything you could.
translation.ja: そんなことないわ

translation.en: You risked your life to save him.
translation.ja: お兄さんを命懸けで 助けようとした

translation.en: You do that every single day.
translation.ja: あなたは毎日 人を救ってる

translation.en: You may not think you're a hero... but I do.
translation.ja: 私にとって あなたは本物のヒーローよ

translation.en: Hey, Stephanie. It's Kate from Channel 12 trying you again.
translation.ja: ステファニー チャンネル12のケイトよ

translation.en: Can you please call me back when you get a chance? Thanks.
translation.ja: 時間ができたら電話して

translation.en: Hey, look at this. There's a hidden column in the spreadsheet. A note section.
translation.ja: これ見て スプレッドシートに 隠れた欄があるわ

translation.en: -[Kate] Anything interesting? -[Lauren] Um...
translation.ja: 何か見つけた？

translation.en: On the first 400-grand withdrawal from Jack, there's some initials.
translation.ja: 最初の40万ドルの 引き落としの時に イニシャルがある

translation.en: PDD. Is that one of the people who got money?
translation.ja: “ＰＤＤ”って お金を受け取った人？

translation.en: -Mmm, no. No one has the initials PDD. -[cell phone vibrates]
translation.ja: そのイニシャルはいない

translation.en: Hey, Stephanie. Thanks for calling me back.
translation.ja: ステファニー ありがとう

translation.en: Yeah, sure. What's up, Kate?
translation.ja: 何かあった？

translation.en: [Kate] When you found me and Jack at that taco place, how did you know where he'd be?
translation.ja: メキシカンの店に来た時 どこから情報を？

translation.en: He sent out a press release.
translation.ja: プレスリリースよ

translation.en: A press release?
translation.ja: マジで？

translation.en: Yeah. Or his publicist put it out.
translation.ja: 広報が出したのかも

translation.en: Carl... Carl Green at, uh...
translation.ja: カール･グリーンだったかな

translation.en: PDD.
translation.ja: ＰＤＤの人よ

translation.en: PDD?
translation.ja: ＰＤＤね

translation.en: [Stephanie] Yeah, Parker Dunlop Development.
translation.ja: パ(Ｐ)ーカー･ダ(Ｄ)ンロップ･ デ(Ｄ)ベロプメントよ

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: Okay, thanks, Steph. I owe you one.
translation.ja: ありがとう　助かったわ

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: -PDD is Parker Dunlop Development. -Oh.
translation.ja: パ(Ｐ)ーカー･ダ(Ｄ)ンロップ･ デ(Ｄ)ベロップメント

translation.en: -What? -It's a political consulting agency.
translation.ja: トップクラスの 政治コンサルよ

translation.en: -Very high-end. -They groom candidates for public office.
translation.ja: トップクラスの 政治コンサルよ 選挙活動や政策 メディア 戦略アドバイスをする

translation.en: Uh, campaigns, policy, media coaching.
translation.ja: 選挙活動や政策 メディア 戦略アドバイスをする

translation.en: Yeah. My dad used them in the last election.
translation.ja: 父も選挙で使ってた

translation.en: But why would they get paid in cash?
translation.ja: なぜ現金で払うの？

translation.en: Oh, Lauren. You have so much to learn about DC.
translation.ja: ローレン 君はＤＣを知らないね

translation.en: Okay, hold on. When was the second $400,000 withdrawal?
translation.ja: 40万ドルが 引き出された日付は？

translation.en: October 27th.
translation.ja: 10月27日よ

translation.en: [Kate] Right.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: The day after Jack and I had dinner and talked about Good Sam.
translation.ja: 私が夕食で サムについて話した翌日だわ

translation.en: So if Jack's first 400,000 was spent on political consulting instead--
translation.ja: 最初の40万ドルが コンサル料に使われたなら…

translation.en: Then who was behind the money in the first four bags?
translation.ja: 最初の４袋分の金は？

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.ja: どこへ？

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me that you weren't Good Sam?
translation.ja: サムじゃないわね

translation.en: I'm gonna call you back.
translation.ja: 折り返す

translation.en: What are you talking about? Of course I'm Good Sam.
translation.ja: 何の話だ？

translation.en: But you didn't tell me the whole story, now, did you, Jack?
translation.ja: 隠してることがあるわよね

translation.en: The first $400,000 you spent on campaign expenses?
translation.ja: 40万ドルは 選挙の活動費に使ったの？

translation.en: PDD?
translation.ja: ＰＤＤよ

translation.en: Why don't you tell me the truth, Jack? And tell me like it really happened.
translation.ja: いい加減に本当のことを 話したらどう？

translation.en: I did give away the last 400,000.
translation.ja: 最後の40万ドルは僕だよ

translation.en: And the rest?
translation.ja: 他は？

translation.en: Somebody else gave that away. I don't know who.
translation.ja: 誰かは分からない

translation.en: And you just took credit for it?
translation.ja: それを利用したの？

translation.en: Look...
translation.ja: いいか

translation.en: Um, I'd never seen anything like the media attention the guy was getting.
translation.ja: メディアの彼に対する 注目度は すさまじかった

translation.en: Everywhere I went, people were talking about Good Sam. Even you.
translation.ja: どこへ行っても 彼の話題で持ちきり

translation.en: And I know how important it is for you to find someone doing good.
translation.ja: 君も必死に探してただろ “善い行いをする人”を

translation.en: I'm that guy.
translation.ja: 僕がそうだ

translation.en: I wasn't just looking for someone doing good, Jack.
translation.ja: 探してたのは 善い行いをする人じゃない

translation.en: I was looking for someone doing good who didn't expect anything in return,
translation.ja: 見返りなしに 善い行いをする人よ

translation.en: and that is not you.
translation.ja: あなたは違う

translation.en: I might not be the guy who started this whole thing, but...
translation.ja: 始めたのは僕じゃないが

translation.en: I did. I gave away $400,000. That's got to count for something.
translation.ja: 40万ドルを提供した事実は 間違いない

translation.en: You gave money away for publicity so that you could run for Congress.
translation.ja: 選挙で名前を売るための お金でしょ

translation.en: Kate, we're both getting a lot of mileage out of this story.
translation.ja: 僕らは２人とも この件で利益を得てる

translation.en: That's what this is about? Mileage?
translation.ja: 利益のため？

translation.en: You lied, Jack.
translation.ja: ウソをついた

translation.en: So, what, the truth doesn't matter as long as you get what you want. Is that it?
translation.ja: 欲しいものが手に入れば 真実は関係ない？

translation.en: Okay, how-- how-- how can I fix this... with you?
translation.ja: どうすれば 君の信用を回復できる？

translation.en: Would it make a difference if I gave away another $400,000?
translation.ja: さらに40万ドルを 追加すればいいか？

translation.en: Where does the truth end and the lie begin?
translation.ja: 何も信用できないわ

translation.en: Hold on. Let's talk about this.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ　話をしよう

translation.en: Kate!
translation.ja: ケイト

translation.en: Kate...
translation.ja: 待て

translation.en: What? Say that again.
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: [Kate] I said Jack Hansen isn't Good Sam.
translation.ja: ジャック･ハンセンは サムじゃない

translation.en: This is the kind of thing that ruins a station's reputation and kills careers.
translation.ja: 局の評判と キャリアに関わる大問題だぞ

translation.en: -Yours and mine. -David, let her talk.
translation.ja: 局の評判と キャリアに関わる大問題だぞ デヴィッド 黙って

translation.en: He lied to me. He just admitted that he's a copycat.
translation.ja: 彼は自分が偽者だと認めたわ

translation.en: After the real Good Sam gave away $400,000, -Jack stepped in and did the same thing. -Great.
translation.ja: 本物のサムが40万ドルを 提供したあとでマネしたのよ

translation.en: He's been working with a DC press agent for months. We got played.
translation.ja: ＤＣのプレスエージェントも 絡んでたわ

translation.en: Okay, so if Jack Hansen isn't Good Sam, then who is?
translation.ja: じゃあ本物のサムは？

translation.en: Well, maybe the real Good Sam's in hiding, you know, to protect his identity.
translation.ja: 本物は正体を隠してるのかも

translation.en: Maybe he's got his own agenda. A marketing ploy.
translation.ja: マーケティング戦略とか

translation.en: There's always the criminal angle. The money's some kinda repayment?
translation.ja: 犯罪絡みの可能性もある

translation.en: Guys, I don't think the real Good Sam is doing this for anything.
translation.ja: 本物のサムには 目的なんてないと思う

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: No, I'm serious.
translation.ja: 真面目な話よ

translation.en: Look, when I first got put on the story, I was sure Good Sam had some ulterior motive.
translation.ja: 最初にこの話を聞いた時は 魂胆があると思ったわ

translation.en: I've been working the bummer beat for years...
translation.ja: ずっと惨事ばかり追ってきて

translation.en: and we know it always gets the ratings.
translation.ja: 確かに視聴率は獲得できる

translation.en: But we choose to show the selfish, violent things people do every day,
translation.ja: だけど私たちは人間の 醜い面を取り上げるばかりで

translation.en: when we know that there are way more people out there doing good.
translation.ja: 善人に目を向けてこなかった

translation.en: Oh, that's a real nice sentiment, Kate. I'm getting all choked up here.
translation.ja: すばらしい演説だった 泣けるよ

translation.en: But that doesn't tell us who the real Good Sam is.
translation.ja: だが本物のサムの 情報はないのか？

translation.en: -Come on, people. Have we got any ideas? -Not yet.
translation.ja: だが本物のサムの 情報はないのか？ まだよ

translation.en: But we've gotta go back to the first four money drops.
translation.ja: 最初の４件に戻って 考えないと

translation.en: Christina, Marie, Jesse, and Faith.
translation.ja: クリスティーナとマリー ジェシーとフェイスの

translation.en: -Find out what they have in common. -[David] Let me think.
translation.ja: 共通点を探して 待て

translation.en: Where do they all live?
translation.ja: 住所は？

translation.en: All over. Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Staten Island.
translation.ja: 全員バラバラだ

translation.en: All right, so that's not it. What about schools, clubs, associations?
translation.ja: 違うな 学校やクラブや所属組織は？

translation.en: -Anything in common? -No, nothing. We checked.
translation.ja: それもない

translation.en: -All born in New York? -Marie was born in Brooklyn.
translation.ja: ＮＹ生まれか？ マリーはそう

translation.en: -Faith was born here, too. -[Lauren] No. No go.
translation.ja: フェイスも クリスティーナは メキシコ生まれだし

translation.en: Christina was born in Mexico and Jesse's from Maine, Camden Harbor.
translation.ja: クリスティーナは メキシコ生まれだし ジェシーはメーンの カムデン港出身よ

translation.en: [Kate] Sorry, what?
translation.ja: 今 何て？

translation.en: Oh, Camden Harbor on the coast of Maine.
translation.ja: メーン州沿岸のカムデン港よ

translation.en: Camden Harbor...
translation.ja: カムデン港…

translation.en: Okay, I-I, uh-- I have a hunch. I'll call you back.
translation.ja: ヒントがあった　連絡する

translation.en: No, no, no, wait, wait. Where are you? I'll send a news van.
translation.ja: 待て バンを送る

translation.en: You can't shoot a hunch, David. Give me some time.
translation.ja: 意味ないわ　少し待って

translation.en: [David] No, Kate, wait. Just--
translation.ja: ケイト 待て…

translation.en: Taxi.
translation.ja: タクシー

translation.en: Do you think this could be the--
translation.ja: これについて…

translation.en: I-I hurt my back a while ago.
translation.ja: 少し前に背中を痛めて…

translation.en: Wait here, please.
translation.ja: 待ってて

translation.en: Hey, Jesse. Uh, you got a couple of minutes to talk about Good Sam?
translation.ja: ジェシー サムについて少しいい？

translation.en: I'm running behind.
translation.ja: 仕事に遅れる

translation.en: Well, I saw a photo of someone who looked like you on a sailboat with Patrick and Eric Hayes.
translation.ja: ヘイズ兄弟とボートの前で 写真を撮ってない？

translation.en: Sailing with the Hayes boys. It's probably me then, yeah.
translation.ja: ヘイズ兄弟とボートなら たぶん僕だ

translation.en: So you knew them?
translation.ja: 知り合い？

translation.en: I was practically a member of the family.
translation.ja: 家族同然だよ

translation.en: Patrick was my best friend since fourth grade.
translation.ja: パトリックは ４年生からの親友だ

translation.en: I did, uh, all the woodwork on his boat. You know, the Crazy Eight.
translation.ja: 一緒にボートを作った クレイジー８だよ

translation.en: I'm sorry, you said the Crazy Eight?
translation.ja: クレイジー８ですって？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Yeah, the accident really wrecked all of us. Eric more than anyone else, but...
translation.ja: 事故で みんな ひどい目に遭ったけど

translation.en: Are you doing a story about a sailboat?
translation.ja: ボートの取材か何か？

translation.en: Yeah, in a way, I might be.
translation.ja: そんなとこ

translation.en: Hi, it's Kate from Channel 12 News. I have a question for you.
translation.ja: チャンネル12のケイトですが 質問があるんです

translation.en: Did you know Patrick Hayes?
translation.ja: パトリック･ヘイズを？

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. I, uh, worked with Patrick
translation.ja: 知ってるわ イニスウェル不動産で 働いてた時の同僚よ

translation.en: at Inniswell Properties.
translation.ja: イニスウェル不動産で 働いてた時の同僚よ

translation.en: First job as a paralegal.
translation.ja: パラリーガルとしてね

translation.en: He was great at the business part,
translation.ja: 彼はビジネス面では 優秀だったけど

translation.en: but, uh, he had dyslexia, so reading wasn't easy for him.
translation.ja: 彼はビジネス面では 優秀だったけど 失読症で苦労してた

translation.en: I helped him with research, contracts...
translation.ja: リサーチや契約書作成で 協力したわ

translation.en: I was Patrick and Eric's babysitter.
translation.ja: パトリックとエリックの ベビーシッターだったの

translation.en: I started when they were little kids, and then they grew up right in front of my eyes.
translation.ja: ２人が大きくなるのを 子供の頃から見守ってきたわ

translation.en: Yes. Patrick Hayes was my patient several years ago.
translation.ja: パトリック･ヘイズは 数年前の私の患者よ

translation.en: I can't discuss specifics, but I can say he made a remarkable recovery.
translation.ja: 詳しくは話せないけど めざましい回復をしたわ

translation.en: He was always so grateful. But I just did what doctors do.
translation.ja: すごく感謝されたけど 私は医師の仕事をしただけよ

translation.en: But, um...
translation.ja: だけど…

translation.en: Patrick can't be your Good Sam...
translation.ja: 彼はサムじゃないわ

translation.en: because he died... months ago.
translation.ja: 数か月前に 亡くなってるもの

translation.en: -Uh, come on in. -Thanks.
translation.ja: 入って ええ

translation.en: -Uh, let me grab your things. -Thanks.
translation.ja: コートを お願い

translation.en: Christina Gomez was your babysitter when you and Patrick were little.
translation.ja: クリスティーナは あなたとパトリックの ベビーシッターだった

translation.en: Faith Haywood's first job was at your brother's company.
translation.ja: フェイスは パトリックの元同僚

translation.en: Dr. Ellis was Patrick's doctor when he was sick.
translation.ja: エリスはパトリックの医師

translation.en: And Jesse Durham was his best friend.
translation.ja: そしてジェシーは彼の親友

translation.en: He used to go sailing with you guys all the time on the Crazy Eight.
translation.ja: いつも一緒に クレイジー８に乗ってた

translation.en: You're Good Sam, aren't you?
translation.ja: あなたがサムね

translation.en: Come on in.
translation.ja: 入って

translation.en: Let's talk.
translation.ja: 話そう

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがと

translation.en: So...
translation.ja: それで…

translation.en: where did you get all this money to give away?
translation.ja: どこでお金を手に入れたの？

translation.en: My brother's boat was destroyed in the accident.
translation.ja: 兄のボートが事故で破損した

translation.en: And, uh...
translation.ja: それで…

translation.en: I got an insurance check...
translation.ja: 保険代が入った

translation.en: for over 400 grand.
translation.ja: 50万ドル以上だ

translation.en: I told them that it wasn't my boat, but...
translation.ja: 俺の船じゃないと言ったが

translation.en: as it turns out, Patrick transferred the ownership to me.
translation.ja: パトリックが所有権を 俺に移転してた

translation.en: Apparently, that was my surprise.
translation.ja: 彼のサプライズは―

translation.en: He was giving me the Crazy Eight for my birthday.
translation.ja: 俺にクレイジー８を くれることだった

translation.en: But I failed him.
translation.ja: だけど俺に…

translation.en: So I couldn't keep the money.
translation.ja: 金をもらう資格はない

translation.en: So that's why you gave it all away.
translation.ja: それで他人にあげたのね

translation.en: There are these friends of his...
translation.ja: 兄の人生を…

translation.en: who really made his life better. You know, in different ways.
translation.ja: いろんな角度から 支えてくれた人たちだ

translation.en: I just thought... they deserved it more than me.
translation.ja: 俺より彼らのほうが よっぽど ふさわしい

translation.en: But why not just give the money to them directly?
translation.ja: でも どうして直接 渡さなかったの？

translation.en: I thought they'd enjoy it more and...
translation.ja: どこから来たか…

translation.en: do what they needed with it if they weren't weighed down by where it came from.
translation.ja: 知らないほうが 役立ててくれると思った

translation.en: I'm really sorry about your brother.
translation.ja: お兄さんのことは 残念だったけど

translation.en: But I think he'd be so proud of what you've done here.
translation.ja: あなたのことを 誇りに思ってるはずよ

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: But I cannot be your story.
translation.ja: 君のネタに ふさわしくない

translation.en: It's not about a story.
translation.ja: ネタじゃないわ

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.ja: もう違う

translation.en: Channel 12 News has learned
translation.ja: ジャック･ハンセン氏は ジャック･ハンセン氏は 〝ジャック･ハンセンが 偽サムと判明〞

translation.en: that Jack Hansen is not the Good Samaritan he claimed to be.
translation.ja: 〝ジャック･ハンセンが 偽サムと判明〞 〝ジャック･ハンセンが 偽サムと判明〞 善きサマリア人では ありませんでした

translation.en: While Jack Hansen did give away the last $400,000,
translation.ja: 〝ジャック･ハンセンが 偽サムと判明〞 彼は最初の４件を見て 彼は最初の４件を見て

translation.en: he was not behind the first four gifts.
translation.ja: 次の４件の提供を 実行しました

translation.en: Rather, he copied the original Good Sam
translation.ja: 彼はサムの善意を

translation.en: in order to promote his own political ambitions.
translation.ja: 政治的野心に 利用したのです

translation.en: So who is the real Good Sam?
translation.ja: では本物のサムは？

translation.en: Unlike Hansen, he seeks no attention.
translation.ja: ハンセンと違い 彼は注目を望みません

translation.en: Instead, he's asked to remain anonymous, expecting nothing in return.
translation.ja: 彼は見返りは求めず 匿名のままを希望しています

translation.en: And a remarkable thing has happened.
translation.ja: さらに すばらしいことに さらに すばらしいことに 〝サムの善意が広がる〞

translation.en: The recipients of Good Sam's generosity became Good Sams themselves.
translation.ja: 〝サムの善意が広がる〞 サムの善意の受取人が 自らサムになったのです サムの善意の受取人が 自らサムになったのです

translation.en: One gave a car to her neighbor.
translation.ja: １人は 隣人に 車椅子を買い

translation.en: One, a substantial donation to a local food bank.
translation.ja: １人はフードバンクに 多額を寄付

translation.en: Another started a scholarship for paralegals hoping to become lawyers.
translation.ja: もう１人は 弁護士になるため 勉強を開始しました

translation.en: The recipient in Brooklyn gave all the money to cancer research.
translation.ja: 別の受取人は全額を ガン研究費に充てました

translation.en: What Good Sam never expected was that we would be inspired by his example.
translation.ja: サムの行いが 私たちを動かしたのです

translation.en: Some people say New York City is a tough place.
translation.ja: ＮＹは皆が 自分のことで精一杯で

translation.en: A place where everyone's out for themselves.
translation.ja: 不親切な街だとも 言われます

translation.en: But as I look across our city,
translation.ja: ですが今のＮＹには

translation.en: I see more kindness between strangers than competition.
translation.ja: 他人に対する親切の輪が 広がっています

translation.en: I see people reaching out to help others...
translation.ja: それは至るところで 見られます

translation.en: on street corners, subway platforms, and in apartment hallways.
translation.ja: 街角や地下鉄のホーム アパートのロビーで

translation.en: Thanks to Good Sam,
translation.ja: サムのおかげで

translation.en: we're becoming better versions of ourselves.
translation.ja: 私たちは成長しています

translation.en: Kate Bradley, Channel 12 News.
translation.ja: ケイト･ブラッドリーが お届けました

translation.en: -Good work. -Thanks.
translation.ja: 上出来だ どうも

translation.en: -Beautiful reporting, Kate. -Thank you.
translation.ja: ステキよ ありがとう

translation.en: [Kate] Bye, guys.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: Hey, Dad.
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: I saw your report on Jack Hansen.
translation.ja: ジャック･ハンセンの リポートを見たよ

translation.en: You were right about him all along. I should have trusted your instincts.
translation.ja: 最初から お前の直感を 信じるべきだったな

translation.en: That's okay. I appreciate that, Dad.
translation.ja: いいのよ　ありがとう

translation.en: Whoever the real Good Sam is,
translation.ja: 本物のサムが誰であれ―

translation.en: a man like that makes us see the world... differently.
translation.ja: 彼のような男は 世界の見方を変えてくれる

translation.en: You haven't met him, but I think you'd really like him.
translation.ja: 会えば きっと 気に入ると思うわ

translation.en: Anyone that makes you happy is all right by me.
translation.ja: お前が幸せなら 誰でも構わない

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: -Night, Katie. -Okay, good night. Love you.
translation.ja: おやすみ 愛してるわ

translation.en: -[Kate laughs] I was not flirting. -[Eric laughs]
translation.ja: 誘ったりしてない 誘ったりしてない １か月後

translation.en: -[Eric] Really? Not even a little? -[Kate] Okay, maybe a little.
translation.ja: １か月後　　 少しも？ 少しだけね

translation.en: -So I brought a little surprise for you. -Oh.
translation.ja: サプライズがある

translation.en: -Close your eyes. -Okay.
translation.ja: 目を閉じて

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: Open.
translation.ja: 開けて

translation.en: [Kate gasps] Cool.
translation.ja: ステキ

translation.en: Are we going stargazing?
translation.ja: 星空観測に行くの？

translation.en: Not quite.
translation.ja: ハズレ

translation.en: It's a clue for where I'm gonna take you tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日行く場所のヒントだよ

translation.en: Hayden Planetarium?
translation.ja: プラネタリウム？

translation.en: The North Pole?
translation.ja: 北極？

translation.en: A pirate-themed party?
translation.ja: 海賊パーティー？

translation.en: That's actually closer. It's on the water.
translation.ja: 惜しいな　水の上だ

translation.en: The Brooklyn Bridge?
translation.ja: ブルックリン橋？

translation.en: Are you asking me to go sailing?
translation.ja: セーリングへ？

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.ja: そうだよ

translation.en: And look at that. For once, it's me asking you questions.
translation.ja: 俺が質問するなんて 珍しいだろ

translation.en: [woman] Uh, hello?
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: I think you've got a fan.
translation.ja: 君のファンだよ

translation.en: -Excuse me, are you Kate Bradley? -[Kate] Yeah.
translation.ja: ケイト･ブラッドリーさん？ ええ

translation.en: -From Channel 12? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: チャンネル12の？

translation.en: I was wondering if you would, uh, thank Good Sam for me.
translation.ja: サムにお礼を伝えてほしいの

translation.en: Sure, but what for?
translation.ja: いいけど何の？

translation.en: I just received a scholarship to go to college.
translation.ja: 大学へ行く 奨学金をもらったの

translation.en: The school didn't know where it came from, but I thought for sure it was from Good Sam.
translation.ja: 誰が払ったか分からないけど きっとサムだわ

translation.en: Um... a full scholarship?
translation.ja: 奨学金を全額？

translation.en: All four years. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ４年分よ

translation.en: Other kids in my graduating class got them as well, plus kids in other schools.
translation.ja: クラスメイトや 他の学校の生徒も―

translation.en: We all received one of these.
translation.ja: 全員これをもらったの

translation.en: Do you think it's from Good Sam?
translation.ja: サムからだと思う？

translation.en: I don't know. I'd have to ask him.
translation.ja: 分からないけど聞いてみるわ

translation.en: Oh, I gotta run, but if it is Good Sam behind all of this...
translation.ja: 行かないと だけどサムのおかげなら―

translation.en: [exhales] ...thank him for me.
translation.ja: お礼を伝えて

translation.en: Sure. Yeah, definitely.
translation.ja: ええ もちろんよ

translation.en: Do you know anything about this?
translation.ja: 何か知ってる？

translation.en: It wasn't me.
translation.ja: 俺じゃないよ

translation.en: Um... I'm doing my good deeds right here.
translation.ja: 善い行いは ここでやってる

translation.en: -And tomorrow, when I take you sailing. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 明日のセーリングも

translation.en: So wait. Really, you had nothing to do with that?
translation.ja: 本当に知らないのね？

translation.en: [laughs] I swear.
translation.ja: 誓うよ

translation.en: You really want to chase that story, don't you?
translation.ja: ネタを追いたい？

translation.en: Kind of.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: Go ahead. I can wait.
translation.ja: 待ってるよ

translation.en: Mmm... in a second.
translation.ja: その前に…

translation.en: Okay. I'll be back.
translation.ja: すぐ戻るわ

translation.en: Excuse me!
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: Wait! Excuse me!
translation.ja: ちょっと待って
